top_stories.title: French and Malaysian authorities are investigating Grok for generating sexualized deepfakes
top_stories.description: France and Malaysia have joined India in condemning Grok for creating sexualized deepfakes of women and minors.
top_stories.author: Anthony Ha
top_stories.content: France and Malaysia have joined India in condemning Grok for creating sexualized deepfakes of women and minors.

top_stories.title: Programmatically creating an IDP solution with Amazon Bedrock Data Automation
top_stories.description: In this post, we explore how to programmatically create an IDP solution that uses Strands SDK, Amazon Bedrock AgentCore, Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Base, and Bedrock Data Automation (BDA). This solution is provided through a Jupyter notebook that enables users to upload multi-modal business documents and extract insights using BDA as a parser to retrieve relevant chunks and augment a prompt to a foundational model (FM).
top_stories.author: Raian Osman
top_stories.content: In this post, we explore how to programmatically create an IDP solution that uses Strands SDK, Amazon Bedrock AgentCore, Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Base, and Bedrock Data Automation (BDA). This solution is provided through a Jupyter notebook that enables users to upload multi-modal business documents and extract insights using BDA as a parser to retrieve relevant chunks and augment a prompt to a foundational model (FM).

top_stories.title: Foundation Models as the Backbone of Next-Gen AI Platforms
top_stories.description: Foundation models as the backbone of next-gen AI platforms, reshaping enterprise AI architecture, governance, and scale. One signal breaks through the AI noise in 2026: most enterprise AI budgets are no longer allocated to applications. They are spent on platforms. top_stories.title: Lemon Slice launches with $10.5M seed round to scale real-time interactive AI avatars
top_stories.description: Frontier artificial intelligence research and product startup Lemon Slice launched today and announced that it had raised $10.5 million in funding. The money will be used to scale up its real-time interactive avatar technology and drive broader commercial adoption of its application programming interface and embedded avatar products. top_stories.title: Accelerate Enterprise AI Development using Weights & Biases and Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
top_stories.description: In this post, we demonstrate how to use Foundation Models (FMs) from Amazon Bedrock and the newly launched Amazon Bedrock AgentCore alongside W&B Weave to help build, evaluate, and monitor enterprise AI solutions. We cover the complete development lifecycle from tracking individual FM calls to monitoring complex agent workflows in production.
top_stories.author: James Yi
top_stories.content: In this post, we demonstrate how to use Foundation Models (FMs) from Amazon Bedrock and the newly launched Amazon Bedrock AgentCore alongside W&B Weave to help build, evaluate, and monitor enterprise AI solutions. We cover the complete development lifecycle from tracking individual FM calls to monitoring complex agent workflows in production.
